title: Failted test with recursion-context 1.0.4
body:
Found in Fedora QA
https://apps.fedoraproject.org/koschei/package/php-phpunit-PHPUnit?collection=f26

Since: php-sebastian-recursion-context 	1.0.2-3.fc26 	> 	1.0.4-1.fc26

```
1) Framework_ConstraintTest::testConstraintIsEqual2 with data set #15 (SplObjectStorage Object (...), SplObjectStorage Object (...), 'Failed asserting that two obj...&0\n )\n', 0, SplObjectStorage Object ())
Failed asserting that two strings are equal.
--- Expected
+++ Actual
@@ @@
          'inf' => null
+         0 => 0
+-        1 => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbca80000000022534a9a (
+-            '00000000688cbe3a0000000022534a9a' => Array &1 (
+-                'obj' => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbe3a0000000022534a9a

++                'obj' => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbe3b0000000022534a9a

+             )
+-            '00000000688cbca80000000022534a9a' => Array &3 (

++            '00000000688cbcae0000000022534a9a' => Array &3 (
++                'obj' => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbcae0000000022534a9a
+                 'inf' => null
+                 0 => 3
+-                1 => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbca80000000022534a9a
++                1 => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbcae0000000022534a9a
+             )
+         )
+-    )
+-    '00000000688cbe350000000022534a9a' => Array &4 (
+-        'obj' => stdClass Object &00000000688cbe350000000022534a9a ()
+-        'inf' => null
+-        0 => 4
+-        1 => SplObjectStorage Object &00000000688cbca80000000022534a9a
      )

  )
```
